name: NVIDIA Corporation
summary: NVIDIA Corporation is a global leader in semiconductor technology, specializing in graphics processing units (GPUs), AI hardware, and accelerated computing solutions for gaming, data centers, and professional visualization. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Santa Clara, California, NVIDIA is recognized for pioneering the GPU and driving advances in artificial intelligence, with a market capitalization that has made it the world’s most valuable publicly traded company as of June 2025.
